EmailTemplate.name: SF licenses unavailable
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Good day! We do not have any Salesforce licenses available now. We are proactively working towards granting you access to the same.
You will receive an email with a link to an online form you must fill in before we grant you access. You will be notified when you are assigned the license.
Thank you for your patience.
Regards, {!Case.OwnerFullName} Salesforce Configuration Team
